addr: 612 S Flower St Los Angeles, CA 90017
title: SoCal Biotech Referral Group
desc: We are a newly-formed (April 2015) group of professionals that serve? SoCal Biotech, Pharmaceutical and Medical Device firms employing fewer than 500 employees. We meet regularly to share intelligence about our shared customer base and to make introductions and referrals for each other. 7:00am-8:00am ?-- Arrivals, Networking, Order food/coffee, Meeting Members commit to regular attendance, holding a leadership post, and annual dues. We are an independent group not affiliated with any other networking or referral organizations.? Visitors are welcome to attend only twice, after which they may apply for membership to join the group.
